pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw: Here you can see that running this with the `WindowsUpdate-Oct2017` branch of `release-tools` brings the Windows CI for `ign-common` to unstable (instead of broken, which it has been stuck at for a while): https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/337/
content.html: Here you can see that running this with the WindowsUpdate-Oct2017 branch of release-tools brings the Windows CI for ign-common to unstable (instead of broken, which it has been stuck at for a while): https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/337/
